short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Offline game to play when bored

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In Quick Blitz, you dodge rapidly approaching enemies to stay alive. Your goal is to survive as long as possible while earning Score to get a new High score. As the game speeds up, dodging becomes more intense and challenging.
